publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2305# Helen Eadie: Scottish Huntington's Association—That the Parliament acknowledges the extreme suffering caused by Huntingdon’s disease, both to sufferers themselves and to their families; recognises that improvement in services to help people cope with the effects of the disease is vital, and congratulates the Scottish Huntingdon’s Association for their recent and highly successful reception held at the Scottish Parliament.
S1M-2305# Scottish Huntington's Association (lodged on 4 October 2001) Michael Matheson*
S1M-2305# Scottish Huntington's Association (lodged on 4 October 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2305# Scottish Huntington's Association (lodged on 4 October 2001) Michael Russell*
S1M-2305# Scottish Huntington's Association (lodged on 4 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2305# Scottish Huntington's Association (lodged on 4 October 2001) Alex Neil*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2305# Scottish Huntington's Association (lodged on 4 October 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-2305# Scottish Huntington's Association (lodged on 4 October 2001) Elaine Smith*
S1M-2305# Scottish Huntington's Association (lodged on 4 October 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-2305# Scottish Huntington's Association (lodged on 4 October 2001) Cathy Peattie*
